item.description: Hello! My name is Maria, and I have 3.5 years old girl Katusha â€“ very friendly and active little one. I would like to open a free weekly playgroup at my home to people with children 3-6 years old. A goal is to teach Russian during playing, We have a lot of toys, and enjoy meet new friends! Please call 508-450-7915 Thank you!

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups
